duties_responsibilities.duty: Partner with the Accessibility Team and associates across Product Management, Engineering, and more to deliver inclusive experiences to customers and users.
Support accessibility engineering strategy and quality testing initiatives to drive accessibility-forward products and services.
Work alongside the Lead Accessibility Engineer to help teams bake accessibility into their practices with an emphasis on user acceptance testing.
Organize and standardize testing planning with teams, including both automated and manual accessibility testing.
Support and help evangelize accessibility philosophy, practices, and methodologies to educate and enable cross-functional teams.
Communicate progress, highlight risks, and remove roadblocks to ensure well-documented, data-driven, and timely results.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent. IAAP certifications in WAS and/or CPACC.
